description:
Staz`s younger sister. Liz is in charge of keeping order in Hell and determines the guilt or innocence of an individual and, subsequently, delivers a deserving punishment. She initially despised Staz and disowned him as her sibling due to the amount of attention that he received from their elder brother, Braz, in comparison to herself. However, during her time with him in the Lower Demon World, she gradually displays sibling affection towards him.
Source: blood-lad.wikia.com
name: Blood T Liz
